CustomField.formula: CASE(Market_Unit__c, 'DFJ_DK', Venue_Rental_Cost__c + ( Price_Per_Cover__c *Capacity__c) + Additional_Fixed_Cost_Incl_VAT__c, 'FA_SE', Venue_Rental_Cost__c + ( Price_Per_Cover__c *Capacity__c) + Additional_Fixed_Cost_Incl_VAT__c, 'Testamente_DK', Venue_Rental_Cost__c + ( Price_Per_Cover__c *Capacity__c) + Additional_Fixed_Cost_Incl_VAT__c , 'Testamente_SV', Venue_Rental_Cost__c + ( Price_Per_Cover__c *Capacity__c) + Additional_Fixed_Cost_Incl_VAT__c ,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Venue Rental Cost + Seating Cost + Fixed Cost
CustomField.label: Budgeted Seating Cost Incl. Vat
